entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain showers beginning in the afternoon then changing to flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
